column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered the cheeseburger
column3: fish tostadas and the burrito. The cheeseburger was cooked a perfect medium
column4: the lettuce and tomato were fresh. The fish tostadas could have been better -- it had a nice crisp shell and the battered shrimp was somewhat unseasoned.... it was OK. The burrito was excellent
column5: even though it didn't really look like a burrito at all. I was intrigued by the fried pickle sandwich
column6: but I had to pull a Chris Rock when I saw it was $10... "Ten dollahs? Good lawd thats a whole lotta money!"
column8: its the cheapest sammich on the menu. Hmm
